thread.title: Danzig Releasing First New Album In 7 Years This May [News]
thread.title_full: Danzig Releasing First New Album In 7 Years This May [News]

title: Danzig Releasing First New Album In 7 Years This May [News]
text:
Danzig Releasing First New Album in 7 Years This May Seven years if we don't include the "Skeletons" covers album, that is. Posted 4 hours ago 1 
Danzig has announced the release of first new album with original music since 2010's " Deth Red Sabaoth ." 
According to the press release, the record will drop in mid-May, with the official title to be "announced shortly." 
The release further reads : "This June also marks the 25th anniversary of ' Danzig III: How the Gods Kill ,' the first Danzig album to crack Billboard's Top 30 and the first Danzig album produced by Glenn Danzig himself. In honor of this occasion, Danzig will be doing a select handful of shows this summer and will perform many songs from that album. 
"Danzig will perform at the Blackest of the Black festival, taking place May 26th - 27th at Oak Canyon Park in Silverado, CA. Complete details to be revealed later this month."
